name: Purple Anarkali Set
description:
Soft, breathable purple fabric with a flattering flare.
Features a chic white geometric print jacket.

name: Teal Blue Lehenga
description: A comfortable georgette-blend outfit perfect for any semi-formal occasion.

name: Black Floral & Pink Lehenga
description: The modern floral print top is paired with a traditional pink skirt for a stunning Indo-Western look.

name: Royal Red Bridal Lehenga
description:
A rich, heavy set featuring peacock and temple design work.
Perfect for a stunning wedding day or reception look.

name: Pastel Pink Ruffle Lehenga
description:
A soft and romantic net outfit perfect for a pre-wedding function or party.
The modern ruffle design adds volume and a whimsical look.

name: Pastel Ruffle Print Lehenga
description:
A light and stylish outfit perfect for a daytime event or garden party.
The modern abstract print and ruffle design add a fun, contemporary look.

name: Sage Green Floral Lehenga
description:
Elegant sage green lehenga with subtle floral embroidery/print.
Features a chic matching crop top and sheer dupatta with detailed borders.

name: Ivory Floral Embroidered Set
description:
Elegant ivory lehenga with delicate pastel floral embroidery.
Features a chic crop top and a full-sleeve matching jacket.

name: Ice Blue Embroidered Lehenga choli
description:
Elegant ice blue lehenga with intricate silver and pink floral embroidery.
Features a chic matching choli and a sheer matching net dupatta.

name: Light Pink Festive Lehenga
description:
A sophisticated outfit perfect for a pre-wedding function or party.
The classic design offers a timeless and elegant look.

name: Green Floral Print Lehenga
description:
Flowy green lehenga with a delicate pink and white floral print.
Features a matching crop top and a sheer organza jacket with puff sleeves.

name: Magenta Embroidered Bridal Lehenga
description:
Heavy magenta lehenga with rich gold and silver embroidery.
Features a short-sleeve choli and dual dupattas for a complete bridal look.
